rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: Vastu-compliant entrance hall that leads to a large living-dining area with Mediterranean style open plan design, incorporating natural light through large windows.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (with ensuite bathroom)
rooms.description: Luxury master bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom, positioned in the northeast quadrant to enhance positive energy as per Vastu. Includes built-in wardrobes and walk-in closets.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Separate guest bedroom ensuring privacy, designed with Mediterranean aesthetics. Positioned opposite to the master bedroom for balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Kids Bedroom
rooms.description: Dedicated kids' bedroom designed with safety and comfort in mind, incorporating colorful Mediterranean design elements. Placed in the east side to invite positive energy.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space designed for luxury with ergonomic workspace, quiet zone. Located in the north-west to align with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Full bathroom on ground floor adjacent to the living area, ensuring convenience while aligning with Vastu (south-east location recommended for bathrooms).

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large wooden door with Mediterranean detailing. Oriented to the north for positive energy flow as per Vastu.

openings.name: Garage Entry
openings.description: Durable metal gate connecting to two-car garage space below ground level or integrated in lower area. Positioned on the west side.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Large windows with Mediterranean design elements placed strategically for maximum natural light and ventilation while maintaining privacy.
